page.title: 11FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My name is Carol Pickett Iam one of 6 people in my family. On Sundays the family do lots of different things. My sister goes to Cane End Riding Stables all day,infact she goes to Cane End all weekend so we don't see alot of her. In the mornings sometimes I play tennis with my Dad or brother at Chiltern Edge School on their tennis courts,My Mum other brother David plays on his bike down the close by our house,My Mum does the housework,and if my brother doesn't play tennis with me he will play on the computer. In the afternoon me and my Mum go to Peppard Church. My Dad goes to the allotment for about 2 hours. Usually everybody goes to Kidmore End Cricket Ground and Play Area.
